Steps to reproduce:
1) Create this compilation unit.

import junit.framework.Assert;
import org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTVisitor;
import org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.QualifiedName;
import org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.SimpleName;

class GetKeyVisitor extends ASTVisitor {
	
	/* (non-Javadoc)
	 * @see
org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTVisitor#visit(org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.SimpleName)
	 */
	public boolean visit(SimpleName node) {
		Assert.assertNull(node.resolveBinding());
	}
}
2) Add a space, but DON'T save the file
3) Try to extract to a local variable node.resolveBinding(). This is in a
"dirty" editor.
4) You should get the exception.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 59214 ***
